text: Bellebrune is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small farming commune, some northeast of Boulogne, at the junction of the N42, D252 and the D238 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The ruins of an 11th-century castle. * The church of St. Leu, dating from the fifteenth century. * The Château de La Villeneuve, dating from the seventeenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de- Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bellebrune
